Articles.Content:
Excellent, the expansion has started, by the time .23 comes around KSP should be known to the entire Steam userbase and quite a lot of YouTube.

(The main page of the forums tracks stats at the bottom, good job getting to that many posts.)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51690-Happy-666-000?p=678445&viewfull=1#post678445

address for your 666,000 post.

I guess it does not tally removed or lost posts?
